title: Define sovereignty, describe loss of sov. from EU

content.question: Define sovereignty. Describe two ways in which member states give up some sovereignty as members of the European Union.

frqParts.text: Define sovereignty. Describe two ways in which member states give up some sovereignty as members of the European Union.

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
